function.name: device_startCourse
function.description: This function is used to initiate a specific mode or course on a SmartThings device.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to initiate the mode or course.

groupAction.description: The group action for initiating the mode or course.

temperatureUnit.description: The unit of temperature for the mode or course.

temperature.description: The temperature value for the mode or course.

duration.description: The duration for the mode or course.

weight.description: The weight value for the mode or course.

weightUnit.description: The unit of weight for the mode or course.

number.description: An integer value for the mode or course.

predefinedCompartment.description: The predefined compartment for the mode or course.
